code:
sequenceDiagram %% Participants participant ClientUI as Client UI participant ChatController as Chat Controller participant WebSocketSvc as WebSocketService participant WebSocketHandler as WebSocketHandler participant MsgProcessor as WebSocketMessageProcessor participant StompSession as STOMP Session participant ClientDB as Client Database participant MessageDAO as Message DAO participant ServerEndpoint as Server WebSocket Endpoint participant ServerController as Message Controller participant SessionService as Chat Session Service %% Sending a Text Message ClientUI->>ChatController: sendMessage() ChatController->>MessageDAO: create(message) MessageDAO->>ClientDB: INSERT INTO messages ClientDB-->>MessageDAO: message.id MessageDAO-->>ChatController: savedMessage ChatController->>WebSocketSvc: sendMessage(savedMessage) WebSocketSvc->>WebSocketHandler: sendMessage(savedMessage) WebSocketHandler->>MsgProcessor: sendMessage(savedMessage) MsgProcessor->>MsgProcessor: Create WebSocketMessageDTO MsgProcessor->>StompSession: send(chatTopic + "/message", messageDTO) StompSession->>ServerEndpoint: /app/chat/{chatId}/message ServerEndpoint->>ServerController: sendChatMessage(chatId, message) ServerController->>ServerController: validateMessage(message, chatId, true) Note over ServerController: Check if user is a participant
in session registry alt Valid Message ServerController->>SessionService: getUsersInChat(chatId) ServerController->>ServerEndpoint: send to /topic/chat/{chatId}/message %% Message broadcast to all subscribers (including sender) ServerEndpoint-->>StompSession: broadcast message StompSession-->>MsgProcessor: handleFrame(frame) MsgProcessor->>MsgProcessor: processChatMessage(dto) MsgProcessor->>WebSocketHandler: notifyMessageReceived(message) WebSocketHandler->>WebSocketSvc: onMessageReceived(message) WebSocketSvc->>ChatController: notify message listeners ChatController->>ClientUI: update UI with new message else Invalid Message ServerController->>ServerController: Create error message ServerController->>ServerEndpoint: return error message ServerEndpoint-->>StompSession: send error StompSession-->>MsgProcessor: handleFrame(error) MsgProcessor->>WebSocketHandler: notifyError(errorMessage) WebSocketHandler->>WebSocketSvc: onError(errorMessage) WebSocketSvc->>ChatController: notify error listeners ChatController->>ClientUI: display error end
